mapper.insert: INSERT INTO team(teamName, stadiumId, createDate) VALUES(#{teamName}, #{stadiumId}, now())
mapper.select: SELECT t.id, s.stadiumName "stadiumName", t.teamName "teamName", t.createDate , ( SELECT COUNT(*) + 1 FROM team WHERE teamName < t.teamName ) AS no FROM team t INNER JOIN stadium s ON t.stadiumId = s.id order by no
SELECT * FROM team ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT t.id, s.stadiumName "stadiumName", t.teamName "teamName", t.createDate FROM team t INNER JOIN stadium s ON t.stadiumId = s.id WHERE t.id = #{id} AND t.name = #{name}
